title: Here’s where to download Apple’s official iPhone repair manuals for free
content:
Apple officially opened up its self-service repair store that allows anyone to buy genuine iPhone parts and tools. And along with the launch, the company has detailed documentation on the step-by-step processes for a variety of repairs. Here’s where to download iPhone repair manuals direct from Apple for free.

more…

The post Here’s where to download Apple’s official iPhone repair manuals for free appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has publicly published detailed documentation on how to fix modern iPhones. Here's where to download iPhone repair manuals for free.
